Literature.Title: Exploring the active core of a novel antimicrobial peptide, palustrin-2LTb, from the Kuatun frog, Hylarana latouchii, using a bioinformatics-directed approach
Literature.Author: Zou W, Zhang Y, Zhou M, Chen X, Ma C, Wang T, Jiang Y, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L
